722695f.text:
Riverside Drive and Park, north fromm West 72nd Street. The spacious home at the right fs the Charles M. Schwab mansion. This occupies the entire block bounded y the Drtve, West End Avenue, between 73rd and 74th Streets. Beyond, are the 12-story Lombard (erected 1907- 4), No. 332 West End Avenue and the massive Athorpe Apartments (erected 192e-5), No. 2201-17 Broadway. Construction
of the latter date thisjview.
